#include <stdio.h>
#include <limits.h>
#include <queue>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <time.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <stack>
#include <map>
#include <string>
#include <malloc.h>
using namespace std;

class Solution {
public:
};

struct Order
{
    bool operator()(pair<long long  int, long long int> const& a, pair< long long int, long long int> const& b) const
    {
        if(a.first==b.first)
        {
          return a.second < b.second;
        }
        return a.first > b.first;
        
    }
};


 int main()
{
    long long int n;
    cin >> n;
    std::vector< pair <long long int,long long int> > v;
    for(long long int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        long long int temp,temp1;
        cin >> temp >> temp1;
        v.push_back(make_pair(temp*temp1,i+1));
    }
    sort(v.begin(),v.end(),Order());
    long long int q;
    cin >> q;
    for(long long int i=0;i<q;i++)
    {
        long long int  temp;
        cin >> temp;
        cout << v[temp-1].second << "\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
